thread.title: Kanye West Auditions For American Idol
thread.title_full: Kanye West Auditions For American Idol

author: Kade Quinn
title: Kanye West Auditions For American Idol
text:
Press Releases Kanye West Auditions For American Idol 
Kanye West auditioned for American Idol recently taking the judges and his wife by surprise. The appearance in the San Francisco auditions of the show can be considered as the second most surprising move of the star this year. The most surprising thing the star did was when he announced his presidential candidacy. 
The face of Jennifer Lopez showed her surprised when Kanye walked in for the audition. But, her initial shock later disappeared when Kanye started performing “Gold Digger” and Lopez got down to the rendition of the star. Kanye West Auditions For American Idol - image credit: billboard.com 
A short clip was posted on Instagram showing Kanye and his wife, Kim Kardashian, celebrating his win together with Ryan Seacrest. The clip also shows Kanye asking Seacrest “are we good now?” It may refer to a confrontation between the two at the red carpet of the Grammy Awards near the start of the year. 
A video posted by American Idol (@americanidol) on Oct 11, 2015 at 12:34pm PDT 
Kanye was in San Francisco to perform at an event of the Democratic National Committee for President Barack Obama. However, his appearance on American Idol may remain a mystery until the final season of the show will air in January. It remains to be seen if Kanye West will participate in the later rounds of the reality show. Kanye West auditioning for American Idol. pic.twitter.com/vJveHArjGA 
— HIP HOP FACTS (@OnlyHipHopFacts) October 11, 2015 Share:
